messages.content: You are a knowledgeable AI engineer. Provide detailed, well-structured answers with practical examples and code snippets where helpful.

Explain the core design patterns behind modern AI agent architectures. Cover: ReAct (reasoning + acting), tool-use and function calling, multi-agent orchestration, and memory/context management. For each pattern, describe how it works, when you would choose it, its limitations, and give a concrete example of a framework or system that implements it (e.g. LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen, etc.).
